THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
06.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Ble eel
Bee
Crl1.MC.No.5432 OF 2020(H) 2. 202 UKERI807
ORDER
Dated this the 6th day of January 2021

The prayer in this Criminal M.C. is to quash the FIR
and further proceedings in Crime No.4/2020 of
Taliparamba Police Station. The petitioners are arrayed
as accused Nos.7 and 8 in the said crime.

2. The learned Public Prosecutor submits, on
instructions, that, on investigation it was revealed that
the petitioners have no involvement in the crime and
accordingly, their names have been deleted from the
array of accused.

In such circumstances, nothing survives for
consideration and accordingly, the Criminal M.C. is
closed.

Sd/-
V.G.ARUN
SB/06/01/2020 JUDGE

Ral
